title: Design & Code: Don't Speed Date, Speed Network Part 2

location.name: Crews Center for Entrepreneurship, 2nd Floor - University of Memphis

summary: Join us for a "speed networking" format where participants rotate every 5 minutes for short introductions and business card exchanges. A great opportunity for tech professionals in Memphis to connect, exchange ideas, and build relationships within the local industry.

description.whoIsThisFor: This event is for UI/UX designers, software engineers, and anyone interested in technology and professional networking within the Memphis tech community.

agenda.details: Grab some food, say hello, and get to know others in the room.

Rapid introductions where participants rotate every 5 minutes for short introductions and business card exchanges. This fast-paced format helps you meet many people and make meaningful connections in a short time.

agenda.activity: Open Mic and Networking Breakout Sessions
agenda.details: We'll wrap up with open mic opportunities, additional networking breakout sessions, and appreciation for everyone who made the night possible. Expect shoutouts for upcoming events and a group photo before we close out the evening.

rsvp.details: Please confirm your attendance via the Meetup app so we can plan accordingly.

description.parkingInfo: There's ample free street parking available near the venue.
stayConnected: Learn more about Design and Code at our website - www.memphisdesignandcode.com
Entrepreneurs and builders, learn more about Epicenter's mission and resources - www.epicentermemphis.org
U of M students, see what else the Crews Center has to offer - www.memphis.edu/crews/
